mapper.update: UPDATE PIECE SET PIECE_STATUS = 'S' WHERE PIECE_NO IN ( SELECT PIECE_NO FROM PIECE_AUCTION WHERE START_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') )
mapper.select: SELECT P.PIECE_NO FROM PIECE P LEFT JOIN PIECE_AUCTION PA ON (P.PIECE_NO = PA.PIECE_NO) WHERE P.PIECE_STATUS = 'S' AND END_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND P.PIECE_NO IN ( SELECT PIECE_NO FROM AUCTION A WHERE A.PIECE_NO = P.PIECE_NO )

SELECT P.PIECE_NO FROM PIECE P LEFT JOIN PIECE_AUCTION PA ON (P.PIECE_NO = PA.PIECE_NO) WHERE P.PIECE_STATUS = 'S' AND END_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND P.PIECE_NO NOT IN ( SELECT PIECE_NO FROM AUCTION A WHERE A.PIECE_NO = P.PIECE_NO )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PIECE_SELL VALUES(#{pieceNo}, (SELECT HOPE_PRICE FROM PIECE_AUCTION WHERE PIECE_NO = #{pieceNo}))
mapper.update: UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_PENALTY = MEMBER_PENALTY - 1 WHERE MEMBER_PENALTY > 1
